responsibilities: Drive customer outcomes, roadmap, and value realization for GenAI technology through hands-on delivery of ServiceNow’s GenAI capabilities and technical advisory activities.
Lead complex, multi-disciplinary projects acting as an SME to solve complex customer issues related to AI solutions.
Provide technical advice and guidance to customers on how to best utilize ServiceNow technologies to achieve their business objectives.
Hands-on delivery of ServiceNow capabilities to customers to drive outcomes and value realization.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including sales, marketing, and product development, to ensure the successful deployment of ServiceNow Now Assist.
Stay up-to-date with industry trends and emerging technologies in the field of GenAI, and apply this knowledge to continuously improve and evolve ServiceNow GenAI offerings.

Contribute to thought leadership and point-of-view documents, white papers, knowledge base articles, and other documentation to make information about ServiceNow GenAI capabilities more accessible to the broader organization, customers, and partners.
qualifications: Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively communicate technical concepts to non-technical audiences.
Ability to work effectively in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.
Customer-focused mindset and commitment to delivering high-quality results.
analysis: The job responsibilities clearly indicate involvement with Generative AI (GenAI) technology. The responsibilities include driving customer outcomes and value realization for GenAI technology, providing technical advisory activities related to GenAI, and staying up-to-date with industry trends in the field of GenAI. Additionally, the job involves contributing to thought leadership and documentation about ServiceNow GenAI capabilities. These responsibilities suggest a strong focus on working with Generative AI technologies. The skills listed, such as communication, problem-solving, and customer-focused mindset, support the ability to work effectively in roles involving complex technologies like GenAI. However, there is no explicit mention of language models or Large Language Models (LLMs) in the job description. The focus is primarily on Generative AI as a broader category.
